mean_cn: adj. 滑稽的，诙谐的，开玩笑的
mean_en: used to describe speech that is meant to be funny but that is usually regarded as annoying, silly, or not proper
sentence: Stop being facetious and get back to work!
sentence_trans: 不要开玩笑了，回去工作！
word_etyma: fac脸，面 ＋ et小 ＋ ious有...性质的 → 做表面化 → facetious轻浮的，开不正经玩笑的
